divs: Sighting Detailsa coworker and i were out back of factory and i looked up. i see this cigar cylinder shape glowing a dull yellow like a half dead flourecent light moving from south to north just above the tree tops like when we see a medivac chopper. it looked unreal sort of like a cartoon image drawn over camera footage. that is until the setting sun hit the side of it and a metallic shine glistened off the side and the edge of the rear. i could see the ends were perfectly rounded, not tapered or flat like a true cylinder. i looked past it for a moment and saw a passenger jet far above with sun glare and a contrail. i could make out the wings the sky was very clear, but the object had no details at all until the sun reflected off the side. i watched it for just over two minutes until it was out of sight over the trees. my coworker was clueless on what it could have been as well.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Akron
There were no other sightings in Akron on or around December 20th 2012
Summary: cartoon like glow but reflected setting sun like metal height speed and path like a medivac chopper
